Class Person

java.lang.Object
Person
Direct Known Subclasses:
BankManager, Customer
public abstract class Person extends Object
Abstract class for representing people in the banking system. Provides common functions for managing accounts and transactions.

  • Constructor Summary

      public List<Account> inquireAccount(String accountNumber)
      Finds accounts with the same given account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - account number to search for
      Returns:
      list of matching accounts

    • inquireAccount

      public static List<Account> inquireAccount(String accountNumber, Map<String,Customer> allCustomers)
      Method for bank managers to find accounts by account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - account number to search for
      allCustomers - map of all customers in the system
      Returns:
      list of same accounts

    • inquireAccount

      public static List<Account> inquireAccount(String firstName, String lastName, Map<String,Customer> allCustomers)
      Method for bank managers to find accounts by customer name.
      Parameters:
      firstName - customer's first name
      lastName - customer's lsat name
      allCustomers - map of all customers in the system
      Returns:
      list of customer's accounts

    • pay

      public void pay(Person receiver, Account fromAccount, Account toAccount, double amount)
      Makes a payment to another person's account.
      Parameters:
      receiver - person receiving the payment
      fromAccount - account to take payment from
      toAccount - account to send money to
      amount - amount fo money to pay
